name: MoodHaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open mood haiku reader.”
”Alexa, start mood haiku reader.”
”Alexa, launch mood haiku reader.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mood haiku reader
des: Mood Haiku Reader offers a unique way to connect with your emotions through the timeless art of Haiku. Whether you feel happy, playful, sad, thankful, nostalgic, or romantic, Mood Haiku Reader has the perfect Haiku to resonate with your mood. Simply tell Alexa about your mood, and let the evocative words of these beautiful poems lift your spirits, bring a smile, or soothe your soul. Dive into a world of poetic expressions tailored to your emotional state and let each Haiku be a moment of reflection and joy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
